text: int quickread_int ( ) { int ch ; int num = 0 ; ch = getchar ( ) ; while ( ch < '0' || ch > '9' ) ch = getchar ( ) ; while ( ch >= '0' && ch <= '9' ) { num = num * 10 + ch - '0' ; ch = getchar ( ) ; } return num ; } int main ( ) { int ar [ 5050 ] ; int n , max ; int t ; int k = 0 , q ; register int i , l , f ; scanf ( "%d" , & t ) ; while ( k < t ) { n = quickread_int ( ) ; for ( i = 0 ; i < ( max = n * ( n + 1 ) / 2 ) ; i ++ ) ar [ i ] = quickread_int ( ) ; for ( l = 1 ; l <= n - 1 ; l ++ ) { if ( l == 1 ) f = max + 1 - 2 * n ; else f = f - n + l ; q = 0 ; while ( q < n - l ) { ar [ f + q ] += ( ar [ f + q + n - l ] > ar [ f + q + n - l + 1 ] ? ar [ f + q + n - l ] : ar [ f + q + n - l + 1 ] ) ; q ++ ; } } printf ( "%d\n" , ar [ 0 ] ) ; } }
